description:
Several girls from the Girls` School are fawning over photographs from http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L.System]`s New Year concert in general and http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kamikurata Kyouta] in particular, only to get scolded by http://anidb.net/ch5904 [Kouno Yui] who tells them a library is a place to learn in silence.
(Actually there`s several of these girls talking in this scene but only one official credit given.)
name: Joshikousei
